(Received 10 p.m.) 9106. 11th July. No. 61. Parti.1. Several small raids on Waziristan border otherwise no change. Part 2.2. Column consisting of one section mountain battery with Gurkha and Zliob militia escort attacked by tribesmen at Kapipon 6th July. Enemy resisted stubbornly and left 37 dead. Our loss 3 killed, 15 wounded, 7 missing, believed killed,3. Post on Nusliki Railway near Kishingi attacked by raiders from Shorawak. Attack repulsed with reported loss to raiders.
